article_title: Former Carpenter Makes Sand Castles a Successful Business
article_text:
By almost any measure, Kirk Rademaker has a dream job. As a professional sand carver, he is paid to travel to beautiful beaches to create huge sand sculptures. He also starred on "Sand Masters," which ran on the Travel Channel from 2011 to 2013. The show filmed six professional sand artists as they created elaborate carvings around the world.

"Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine I'd have this life," says Mr. Rademaker, who runs Sand Guys International, a sand-sculpting firm, with his partner,...

twitter.description: Kirk Rademaker, who was featured in cable TV's "Sand Masters," travels most of the year to do sand sculptures for corporate clients around the world.
twitter.title: He Found His Footing on the Beach

image.alt: How one man built a business out of sand castles.
